condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: 1 Salary and Allowances

description.narrative: Human Resources (HR) unit sustained the high demand for coordination and guidance to optimize effectiveness of 129 staff and 69 individual consultants for efficient delivery of Ghana Country programme results. Initial progress was made implementing global HR Reforms and in new role of strategic business partnership with programmes. | Status:Met | As-of Date:22/12/2017
